remarks:
Cancellation law for addition over the reals.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Jan-2013.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.) 

---

 Cancellation law for addition over the reals.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Jan-2013.)
statement: readdcan $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR ) -> ( ( C + A ) = ( C + B ) <-> A = B ) ) $.
